title: Determining the Peak Apparent Magnitude of Supernova #4
content: In this part of the investigation, you will work only with Type Ia supernovae. As mentioned previously, Type Ia supernovae are special because they can be used to measure distances in the Universe. In this part of the investigation, you will work only with Type Ia supernovae and learn how to use them to calculate distances.
